title: the place you must see
text: A good thing that you cab see it from any engle. I found a spot on the hills nearby - amazing view on the Acropolis! But if you want to go in, better do it early in the morning, when the sun is not that hot

title: Cosy and tasty!
text: I tend to visit restaurants with the recommendations. This old meze-restaurant was recommended by me Greek friends and it was a really nice choice. Here you can try different greek foods. And for the foodie like me it was a very enjayable experience. Also, I like the location and the price. Very good price for the central area!

title: Love this place!
text: Simply fell in love with this place! My greek friend showed this hidden gem to me. It is an old house with own atmosphere

title: This is amazing place in the heart of Athens!
text: So many historical buildings, ruins, nice caffes (go find some cosy ones!). And beautiful Anafiotika - like an island in the center of the city

title: Highly recommended.
text:
My friend and I had a very positive experience with a food tour made by Giorgos. We tried so many different things and learned fun facts about them (which is not possible to learn alone if you visit Greece just for a few days).

Giorgos was fun, energetic and very polite. He has so much knowladge in his field! Highly recommended.
